Bio

Related

Stats

Biography

Graduate (2023): Appeared in seven games and started once... had 14 tackles, two tackles for loss and two pass breakups on the season... had three tackles, 1.5 tackles for loss and a pass breakup against Fordham (9/9)... had four tackles against Bowling Green (10/14)... had three tackles at Kent State (10/21)... had two tackles and a tackle for loss at Toledo (10/31).

Previous School: Graduate transfer from Cornell where he played 30 games over three seasons... totaled 97 tackles, two interceptions, eight passes defended, two forced fumbles and three fumble recoveries in his time with the Big Red... was a team captain his senior season... had 43 tackles, an interception, four pass breakups, two forced fumbles and a fumble recovery en route to earning All-Ivy League Honorable Mention honors in 2022... a native of Michigan, helped lead Muskegon High School to a state championship as a senior while playing safety, outside linebacker and wide receiver... played in the M.A.C. all-star game after making 28 tackles with six pass breakups and an interception during his senior season.
